title: Anatomy Recipe
description: Defines what parts a creature should have (types, tags, counts, preferences, exclusions)

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema that this document conforms to

recipeId.description: Unique identifier for this anatomy recipe

slots.description: Map of slot keys to slot configurations

requires.description: Co-presence requirements - all parts in a group must be present together

excludes.description: Mutual exclusion constraints - parts in a group cannot coexist

isMacro.description: If true, this recipe is a macro for inclusion by other recipes

slotDefinition.description: Configuration for a single anatomy slot

partType.description: Required. The type of part this slot expects (e.g., 'breast', 'leg', 'arm')

preferId.description: Optional. Exact entity ID to prefer if available

tags.description: Component tags that must be present on matching parts

notTags.description: Component tags that must NOT be present on matching parts

min.description: Minimum number of parts (soft limit, clamped by socket availability)

max.description: Maximum number of parts (soft limit, clamped by socket availability)

exact.description: Exact number of parts desired (soft limit, clamped by socket availability)

count.description: Desired count of parts for this slot
